Geoff Petrie

Draft Rating:

B

Geoff Petrie ranks in the 69th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Petrie's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Peja Stojaković with 14th pick but was worth 7th pick.
  • Drafted Gerald Wallace with 25th pick but was worth 4th pick.
  • Drafted Hassan Whiteside with 33th pick but was worth 6th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Thomas Robinson with 5th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted Jason Thompson with 12th pick but was worth 51th pick.
  • Drafted Corliss Williamson with 13th pick but was worth 47th pick.

Trade Rating:

C+

Geoff Petrie ranks in the 54th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Chris Webber to SAC.
  • Lost Mitch Richmond, Otis Thorpe to WAS.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Donté Greene, Bobby Jackson, Omri Casspi to SAC.
  • Lost Metta World Peace, Patrick Ewing, Sean Singletary to HOU.

Signing Rating:

D-

Geoff Petrie ranks in the 24th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Vlade Divac in 1999.
  • Signed Bobby Jackson in 2000.
  • Signed Jon Barry in 1999.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Chris Dudley in 1993.
  • Signed John Salmons in 2006.
  • Signed Mikki Moore in 2007.
